entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query pipeline architecture issues #31327
  • Query: convert identifiers to be generic SqlExpressions rather than ColumnExpressions #31326
  • .Contains() on a simple List<T> within a LINQ query Where clause results in Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException: 'Incorrect syntax near '$'.' #31323
  • Throw more specific error when attempting to leverage 'ExecuteUpdate/Delete' methods with InMemory provider #31320
  • Include if a migration has destructive operations in `ef migrations list --json` #31319

Closed

  • Json: BigModel_with_JSON_columns test fails to find JsonValueReaderWriter when processing compiled model #31201
    8.0.0
  • Stackoverflow exception on OrderBy with expression #31307
  • GroupBy().Select().Where() works for simple POCOs but not when using a class or record with a constructor for initialization #31279
  • Json serialisation throws an error when Sqlite package is included #31313
  • [Q]: Why? `InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Int32' to type 'System.String'.` #31293

PullRequests

Created

  • More changes from API review #31324
    auto-merge
  • Translate generic math calls using the existing Math translators #31322
  • Fix to #31100 - Switch to storing enums as ints in JSON instead of strings #31317

Merged

  • Fix NativeAOT warnings in EFCore.Abstractions #31321
    auto-merge
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23370.3 #31284
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Re-enable BigModel_with_JSON_columns #31318

Updated

  • Fix to #30922 - Most cases of projecting a primitive collection don't work #31263
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
    waiting-for-response
  • Add DateOnly.ToString / TimeOnly.ToString query mapping for SQL Server #31289
